wikipedia_page.main: General Sir Charles Mansfield Clarke, 3rd Baronet,  (13 December 1839 – 22 April 1932) was a British Army officer who was Quartermaster-General to the Forces.

response: *Brigadier-General Hon. Charles Granville Fortescue (born 30 October 1861, died 1 February 1951), married Ethel Clarke, daughter of Sir Charles Clarke, 3rd Baronet and had issue.
*Sir Charles Clarke, 3rd Baronet (1839–1932), Quartermaster-General to the Forces
